contentMetadata.content:
{{Multiple issues| {{COI|date=February 2017}} {{notability|Companies|date=February 2017}} }} {{infobox company | name = Bliss Media Limited | logo = | caption = | type = [[Privately held company|Private]] | foundation = [[Shanghai]], [[China]] (2011) | location = [[Shanghai]], China | num_locations = 2
(with office also in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]], [[United States]] | founder = Wei Han, CEO & President, [[Film Producer]] | industry = [[list of entertainment industry topics|Entertainment industry]] | products = [[film|Motion pictures]] | revenue = | owner = | divisions = | parent = | homepage = {{URL|http://blissmedialtd.com}} }} '''Bliss Media''' is a Chinese film company specializing in international film financing, production and distribution. The company was founded in 2011 and now holds offices in both Shanghai and Los Angeles. It has been involved in the investment, production and distribution process of international feature films including ''[[Hacksaw Ridge]]'', ''[[Jackie (2016 film)|Jackie]]'', and ''[[Loving (2016 film)|Loving]]''.{{cite press release|last1=Brzeski|first1=Patrick|title=China's Bliss Media Takes Stake in Wild Bunch's Insiders|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/chinas-bliss-media-takes-stake-864196|accessdate=24 February 2017|publisher=The Hollywood Reporter|date=11 February 2016}} Hacksaw Ridge ultimately became the highest grossing imported war film in China.{{cite web|last1=Kay|first1=Jeremy|title='Hacksaw Ridge' becomes biggest imported war film in China|url=http://www.screendaily.com/box-office/hacksaw-ridge-becomes-biggest-imported-war-film-in-china/5112578.article|website=Screendaily.com|accessdate=24 February 2017}} ==Founder== The founder of Bliss Media is Chinese American producer Wei Han. She has a background in investment banking.{{cite web|last1=Goldstein|first1=Gregg|title=YooZoo Bliss Fund Finances 'League of Angels'|url=https://variety.com/2015/film/news/you-zoo-bliss-fund-finances-league-of-angels-1201635990/|website=Variety.com|date=8 November 2015 |accessdate=27 February 2017}} She has also been part of the executive producer team for the 2016 movie ''[[Jackie (2016 film)|Jackie]]''.{{cite web|last1=Barraclough|first1=Leo|title=First Look: Natalie Portman Stars as Jacqueline Kennedy in 'Jackie'|url=https://variety.com/2015/film/global/first-look-natalie-portman-jacqueline-kennedy-1201663443/|website=Variety.com|date=16 December 2015 |accessdate=24 February 2017}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- !'''Year''' !! '''Title''' !! '''Notes''' |- | 2013 || ''[[The Lovers (2013 film)|The Lovers]]''
(known as ''Time Traveller'' in UK) || One of the production companies |- | rowspan=3|2016 || ''[[Hacksaw Ridge]]'' || Acquired Chinese distribution rights{{cite web|last1=Busch|first1=Anita|title='Hacksaw Ridge' To Pass $100M At Int'l Box Office This Weekend|url=https://deadline.com/2017/01/hacksaw-ridge-100-million-international-box-office-im-global-1201884588/|website=Deadline.com|date=12 January 2017 |accessdate=24 February 2017}} |- | ''[[Jackie (2016 film)|Jackie]]'' || One of the production companies; acquired Chinese distribution rights{{cite web|last1=Barraclough|first1=Leo|title=First Look: Natalie Portman Stars as Jacqueline Kennedy in 'Jackie'|url=https://variety.com/2015/film/global/first-look-natalie-portman-jacqueline-kennedy-1201663443/|website=Variety.com|date=16 December 2015 |accessdate=24 February 2017}} |- | ''[[Loving (2016 film)|Loving]]'' || Its affiliate company Insiders is in charge of international sales |- | rowspan = 2| 2017 || ''[[S.M.A.R.T. Chase]]'' || One of two production companies & co-distributor{{cite web|url=http://www.screendaily.com/news/afm-imr-revs-up-orlando-bloom-starrer-smart-chase/5110910.article|last1=Goodfellow|first1=Melanie|title=IMR revs up Orlando Bloom-starrer 'S.M.A.R.T. Chase'|publisher=[[Screen International]]|accessdate=February 14, 2017}}{{cite web|title=S.M.A.R.T. Chase new movie poster released|url=http://weibo.com/5866419168/Eyxcm5nUI|website=S.M.A.R.T. Chase at Sina Weibo|publisher=Bliss Media|accessdate=6 March 2017}} |- | ''[[Kings (2017 film)|Kings]]'' || One of the production companies & co-distributor{{cite web|last1=McNary|first1=David|title=China's Bliss Media, Maven Pictures to Finance Halle Berry's L.A. Riots Movie (EXCLUSIVE)|url=https://variety.com/2016/film/news/la-riots-movie-halle-berry-bliss-media-maven-pictures-1201943527/|website=Variety.com|date=15 December 2016 |accessdate=24 February 2017}} |- | 2020 || ''[[Resistance (2020 film)|Resistance]]'' || One of the production companies{{cite web |title=Jesse Eisenberg WW2 Pic 'Resistance' Lands At IFC – AFM |url=https://deadline.com/2019/11/jesse-eisenberg-ww2-pic-resistance-lands-ifc-1202782111/ |website=Deadline |date=10 November 2019 |accessdate=6 January 2020}} |- | 2022 || ''[[The King's Daughter (2022 film)|The Moon & the Sun]]''
(known as ''The King's Daughter'' going forward) || One of the production companies{{cite web|last1=Lincoln|first1=Ross A.|title=Paramount's 'The Moon And The Sun' Off Schedule, Release Set For 'Same Kind Of Different'|url=https://deadline.com/2015/03/paramounts-the-moon-and-the-sun-off-schedule-same-kind-of-different-gets-release-1201395860/|website=Deadline.com|date=20 March 2015 |accessdate=24 February 2017}} |- | 2023 || ''[[Ferrari (2023 film)|Ferrari]]'' || One of the production companies |} ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Film production companies of China]] [[Category:Film distributors of China]] {{film-company-stub}}
contentMetadata.text: Bliss Media is a Chinese film company specializing in international film financing, production and distribution. The company was founded in 2011 and now holds offices in both Shanghai and Los Angeles. It has been involved in the investment, production and distribution process of international feature films including Hacksaw Ridge, Jackie, and Loving. Hacksaw Ridge ultimately became the highest grossing imported war film in China. The founder of Bliss Media is Chinese American producer Wei Han. She has a background in investment banking. She has also been part of the executive producer team for the 2016 movie Jackie. Brzeski, Patrick (11 February 2016). "China's Bliss Media Takes Stake in Wild Bunch's Insiders" (Press release). The Hollywood Reporter. Retrieved 24 February 2017. Kay, Jeremy. "'Hacksaw Ridge' becomes biggest imported war film in China". Screendaily.com. Retrieved 24 February 2017. Goldstein, Gregg (8 November 2015). "YooZoo Bliss Fund Finances 'League of Angels'". Variety.com. Retrieved 27 February 2017. Barraclough, Leo (16 December 2015). "First Look: Natalie Portman Stars as Jacqueline Kennedy in 'Jackie'". Variety.com. Retrieved 24 February 2017. Busch, Anita (12 January 2017). "'Hacksaw Ridge' To Pass $100M At Int'l Box Office This Weekend". Deadline.com. Retrieved 24 February 2017. Barraclough, Leo (16 December 2015). "First Look: Natalie Portman Stars as Jacqueline Kennedy in 'Jackie'". Variety.com. Retrieved 24 February 2017. Goodfellow, Melanie. "IMR revs up Orlando Bloom-starrer 'S.M.A.R.T. Chase'". Screen International. Retrieved February 14, 2017. "S.M.A.R.T. Chase new movie poster released". S.M.A.R.T. Chase at Sina Weibo. Bliss Media. Retrieved 6 March 2017. McNary, David (15 December 2016). "China's Bliss Media, Maven Pictures to Finance Halle Berry's L.A. Riots Movie (EXCLUSIVE)". Variety.com. Retrieved 24 February 2017. "Jesse Eisenberg WW2 Pic 'Resistance' Lands At IFC – AFM". Deadline. 10 November 2019. Retrieved 6 January 2020. Lincoln, Ross A. (20 March 2015). "Paramount's 'The Moon And The Sun' Off Schedule, Release Set For 'Same Kind Of Different'". Deadline.com. Retrieved 24 February 2017. v t e

texts.title: Founder
texts.value: The founder of Bliss Media is Chinese American producer Wei Han. She has a background in investment banking.<ref>{{cite web|last1=Goldstein|first1=Gregg|title=YooZoo Bliss Fund Finances 'League of Angels'|url=https://variety.com/2015/film/news/you-zoo-bliss-fund-finances-league-of-angels-1201635990/|website=Variety.com|date=8 November 2015 |accessdate=27 February 2017}}</ref> She has also been part of the executive producer team for the 2016 movie [[Jackie (2016 film)|Jackie]].<ref>{{cite web|last1=Barraclough|first1=Leo|title=First Look: Natalie Portman Stars as Jacqueline Kennedy in 'Jackie'|url=https://variety.com/2015/film/global/first-look-natalie-portman-jacqueline-kennedy-1201663443/|website=Variety.com|date=16 December 2015 |accessdate=24 February 2017}}</ref>
